name: Taoufik Hofmann
comment: Was offered a good deal for photography. Had some concerns regarding the service but Sam was great in helping me out and easing my concerns. So far I have had a positive experience and I feel comfortable with Sam!

name: Danielle Frisina
comment: You did some amazing job with not only our photos but our videos and in capturing the beautiful moments I will be able to relive for the rest of my life.Thank you for sharing our special day and helping us relive it through the images and videos!

name: Pribislav Kovačić
comment: I had a wonderful experience with Eivan’s photography! I had an enthusiastic, professional, and accommodating photographer! Cannot wait to see the images and captures moments. Highly recommend MediaLab's services.

name: Steven Benson
comment: We were kept up to date on the information about our photographer, got to meet with him virtually to discuss details, and he checked in about the schedule several times. On the day of the event he was charming and efficient and took all the photos we ever could have wanted. Really excellent work.

name: Zac McCabe
comment: I worked with Gregory I, Will C, and Ali J. They were amazing. They worked hard to get the best shot & videos. They even found an extra location to get some shots in the snow for me. They worked well together and I cant wait to see the finished product.

name: Dragoslav Tomić
comment: MediaLab was such a joy to work with! I loved how I was contacted every step of the way so I never felt lost during the process! Someone reached out to me to discuss how MediaLab works.

name: Dragoslav Tomić
comment: I had the best experience with MediaLab during the pandemic and giving birth I postponed 3 times and they were so accommodating. The staff were amazing and made my wedding day the best day of our lives.
